Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-5535 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-35
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-5535 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-35. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 1.1.1k-35, affected by CVE-2024-5535
